snippet.title: Song in the Smoke: Launch Trailer — Out Now on Oculus Quest, Oculus Rift & PlayStation VR
snippet.description:
Song in the Smoke is now available on Oculus Quest, Oculus Rift & PlayStation VR! 

Join our Discord! Devs are here to answer your questions: https://discord.gg/DDMGby9t

--

Song in the Smoke is a single-player survival adventure game, set in a beautiful but deadly world outside of time. The emphasis is very much on survival: players will need to camp, hunt, craft, and build fires in order to survive. There are deep mystical narrative components throughout the experience, waiting to be uncovered. 

Oculus Rift: https://www.oculus.com/experiences/rift/3283022771771133
Oculus Quest: https://www.oculus.com/experiences/quest/4207810312567000/
PlayStation Store: https://www.playstation.com/en-us/games/song-in-the-smoke/

Please check out our website for more information: http://songinthesmoke.com
And get survival tips here: http://songinthesmoke.com/survivaltips

Follow 17-BIT:
http://twitter.com/17_BIT
http://www.instagram.com/17.bit/
http://www.facebook.com/SeventeenBit/
http://www.youtube.com/c/17BIT/
